description:
A powerful NVDA add-on to encode and decode text using Base64 in one click.
To access this add-on, press NVDA+Control+J or go to NVDA menu > Tools menu and open it.
Developed by: Sujan Rai at Tech Visionary Team.
For any requests or suggestions, contact me at sujanrai8448@gmail.com.
For more instructions and uses, press help in the add-on.
